title: Shocking moment workers in Argentina are almost crushed dead by a pool they lowered from a building
text:
Shocking video captures the moment contractors narrowly avoid being crushed when a swimming pool frame they are trying to lower from a rooftop crashes down to the street.

Workers in Argentina set up a pair of planks against the ledge of residence in an attempt to slide the metal frame to the ground.

The employees used two planks to hoping to slide the structure down in a controlled manner.

A harness is placed around both sides of the pool for the four men on the ground to slowly lower it, while two others push it from the top.

A group of workers in Argentina were nearly crushed dead by a pool they attempted to lower down from a building roof

A still image from a video shows the moment four men lowered down a swimming pool before they lost control of it and almost got crushed

As the frame is lowered, the workers lose control and it rapidly slides off the makeshift rungs.

The pool crashes to the floor and nearly wipes out the four men below.

Two workers (lower left) avoid the metal structure when it rapidly slid off a makeshift ladder

One of the workers, who was standing by the poles, ran away as it starts sliding.

Another contractor falls flat on his back with his legs raised against the pool as it comes to a standstill.

Miraculously, it appears no one was injured.
description: Video images from Argentina captured the moment a group of workers avoided being killed on the job as they lowered a pool to the street
